29see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/. */
30
31#include <stdarg.h>
32#include <string.h> /* for strlen */
33
34#include "gmp.h"
35#include "gmp-impl.h"
36
37
38int
39gmp_snprintf (char *buf, size_t size, const char *fmt, ...)
40{
41 struct gmp_snprintf_t d;
42 va_list ap;
43 int ret;
44
45 va_start (ap, fmt);
46 d.buf = buf;
47 d.size = size;
48
49 ASSERT (! MEM_OVERLAP_P (buf, size, fmt, strlen(fmt)+1));
50
51 ret = __gmp_doprnt (&__gmp_snprintf_funs, &d, fmt, ap);
52 va_end (ap);
53 return ret;
54}
55
